Challenge

Class SpriteConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • Challenge.SpriteConverter

  • abstract class SpriteConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    SpriteConverter is an abstract class used to edit sprites before they are rendered into the game, resizing and rotating etc
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    George Carpenter
